items.title: Intel’s stock is rising as Trump suggests a path forward after CEO’s White House visit
items.description: Tensions seem to be easing between Intel’s Lip-Bu Tan and Trump, who days ago called for the CEO’s firing but now praises for his “amazing” success st...

items.title: Kodak warns investors it might not be around much longer
items.description: A plan to use excess funds from to the end of a pension plan to pay down debt and remain afloat is “progressing as planned,” the company said.

items.title: The tech sector hasn’t been this top-heavy in decades. That could be an opportunity for investors hunting for bargains.
items.description: Software stocks are struggling while semiconductor names soar, creating a divergence within the high-flying tech sector

items.title: Alphabet, Meta, Amazon and Microsoft share this one thing — and it’ll keep the stocks fired up
items.description: To anyone still shouting “bubble”: Please sit down.

items.title: Why your stock portfolio may actually ‘feel’ depressed that summer is almost over
items.description: Halloween merchandise and pumpkin-spice lattes in August are reminders that winter is coming.
